output.title: Break-bot report
output.summary:
This pull request introduces **34 breaking changes**, causing **25 detections** in client code.
**6 of 15 clients are impacted** by the changes (40%).

app.name: break-bot

repository.name: spoon
repository.description: Spoon is a metaprogramming library to analyze and transform Java source code. :spoon: is made with :heart:, :beers: and :sparkles:. It parses source files to build a well-designed AST with powerful analysis and transformation API.
